name: Shapemaze (fwugFaz)
description:
(Some features listed may not be in current demo)

Shapemaze is a simple topdown multiplayer maze hunt breed. Find all the coins in a stage and make your way to the goal.

Story (Yes this game has a story)

Alpha has taken the 3 Power Coins that power the land. Play as Cubey and recover the three coins from Alpha before he does something bad with them.

Features:

  • Full Story Mode as you venture through many mazes and recover the coins of the land. You can even pair up with a friend
  • Speedrun Mode, no coins, just rush to the goal. Get through all the mazes as fast as you can.
  • Quickplay Mode: no time for a story, replay completed mazes from the story mode, or even play possible DLC Mazes.
  • Multiplayer Mode: play with either up to 4 players through couch co-op or hundreds online* as you work together and complete randomly chosen mazes.
  • Minigame Mode: Pass a controller and play various minigames with local friends. minigames include Tag, Coin Rush, Maze Race, and many more.

*Requires a Game Maker Server Account

Controls:

Keyboard

Arrow Keys - Move (1P)

WASD - Move (2P)

Enter - Select/Save and Return to Main Menu

Backspace - Back

(You can also use the mouse in the menus if you wish)

Credits:

Evan King - Title Menu (Moon Base), Song 1 (Thermal), Song 2 (Flouride), Song Clear (jingle_success_1),  Game Over (jingle_failure_1), Various Sound Effects

EliteFerrex - 8-Bit Boss Battle: 4

Get a majority of Shapemaze's OST here: https://evanking.bandcamp.com/album/20xx
